cast.overview: A stranger arrives in a little village and soon after a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman is drawn into the incident and is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.
cast.title: The Wailing

details.biography: Jo Yeon-Hee (조연희), born October 2, 1977, is a South Korean actress. She graduated from Dongguk University, majoring in Theater and Film. Jo began her acting career in 1997 and has appeared in numerous television dramas and films. Her prominent television credits include “One Dollar Lawyer,” “Mr. Queen,” and “One the Woman.” She has also acted in films such as “The Houseguest and My Mother,” “Someone Behind You,” and “Veteran.” In 2010, she received the Rookie of the Year Award at the 3rd Korean Drama Awards. Jo Yeon-Hee married Han Dong-hwa in 2018 and is represented by Relationship Entertainment (Inyeon Entertainment Co.).
details.name: Jo Yeon-hee
